definitions.definition: A fortified place; a large and permanent fortification , sometimes including a town ; for example a fort, a castle ; a stronghold ; a place of defense or security .
A position that, if obtained by the weaker side, will prevent penetration by the opposing side, generally achieving a draw .

main_definition: A fortified place; a large and permanent fortification , sometimes including a town ; for example a fort, a castle ; a stronghold ; a place of defense or security .
secondary_definitions: ( chess ) A position that, if obtained by the weaker side, will prevent penetration by the opposing side, generally achieving a draw .
